topics.body:
Well that's relieving.

[spoiler]So -Attack on Titan's Chuck Norris- Levi just gave the Female Titan a good slicing-and-dicing-style thrashing, and saving Eren in the process. And not even twisting his ankle did squat about it.[/spoiler]

That's much better.
Also, I always chuckle whenever someone in the show comments on Mikasa possibly being in love with Eren, considering how protective of him she really is. I wouldn't blame anyone for thinking that. Even I sometime think she "wants" Eren. Although, that would come off as kind of awkward, and possibly creepy, considering she's also Eren's adopted sister...

_...wait a second..._
!https://img0.derpicdn.net/img/view/2013/2/1/230020__safe_twilight+sparkle_animated_filly_shining+armor_bed_colt_friendship+is+witchcraft_not+creepy_francis+sparkle.gif!
~Friendship is Witchcraft? What the heck are you doing in my Attack on Titan?~

~But if that's true, then that means...
...oh my...~
!https://img0.derpicdn.net/img/view/2013/12/22/503574__safe_solo_animated_meme_upvotes+galore_reaction+image_power+ponies_spoiler-colon-s04e06_mane-dash-iac_cannot+unsee.gif!
-~*NO FAN ARTISTS WHAT ARE YOU DOING*~-
